extendedInfo.description: Drivers Ed South Dakota is brought to you free of charge by DriversEd.com!Need your South Dakota driver's license? Study anytime, anyplace with Drivers Ed South Dakota for Android devices! Don't be one of the 70% of people who fail their DPS test the first time!FREE from DriversEd.com, the leader in online driver's ed, this full-featured study companion can quiz you from a database of more than 350 DPS questions. Pick the length of each test: take a test of 5 questions, or as many as 100. It's your choice!Your results are recorded, so you can track your progress and review your incorrect answers. Retake past tests unlimited times to make sure you know the material.Use the Flash Card feature to study the important facts youneed to know for the test.Of course, you'll still need to read the South Dakota Driver's Manual to prepare for the permit test. With Drivers Ed South Dakota, you can download the South Dakota Driver's Manual to your device anytime! (It downloads only once, and is saved to your device, so you don't ever have to wait for it again.)The South Dakota Driver's Manual is an official DPS publication, in PDF format. The text is crystal-clear, and you can pinch to zoom, just like a web page.This app works with DriversEd.com's South Dakota driver's ed course. DriversEd.com is approved by the Road Safety Educators' Association and accredited by the Driving School Association of the Americas.You can even get 2.5 credits toward your high school graduation by taking driver's ed with us!
